titles.title: A bill to designate "The Stars and Stripes Forever" as the national march of the United States of America.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Designates "The Stars and Stripes Forever" as the national march.
